external_games.name: The Book Of Yorle: Save The Countryside

name: The Book of Yorle: Save the Countryside
summary: Continue the story in Save The Countryside, the third DLC for The Book Of Yorle. Explore the hillside while fighting against the Evil Ones. Swim in the lake but make sure to hold your breath and don't drown! Search for mysteries that lie beneath the volcano. Find out what happened to the fisherman that supplied the village.
